channel.title: Juniper CLI Basics - Perfect Dark Mode
channel.description: Connection Methods Factory default: User: root No password Fxpo = ethernet management interface SSH, FTP. Telnet, http(s) Cannot route traffic Management purposes only Initial Login Logging for the First Time • Nonroot users are placed into the CLI automatically • Root user SSH login requires explicit config router (ttyu0) Serial console login : user Password: JUNOS 15.1X49-DIOO.6 built 2017-06-28 07:33:31 UTC • The root user must start the CLI from the shell
